channel.description: Recent content in _index on Atanas Yonkov

item.title: 20 Excel Formulas You Should Start Using Now
item.description: MS Excel is one of the most popular data analysis tools in the world. More and more companies greatly depend on this software and quite a lot of people are using it on a daily basis. However, from my experience, not many are taking full advantage of the opportunities that the program can offer. Here is my list of the 20 most important Excel functions, which everyone should use in order to increase his efficiency.

item.title: 4 Awesome Things You Can Do with Hugo
item.description: Hugo is an awesome static website generator, which you can use to create portfolio websites and blogs. So, what makes Hugo so great? Speed Hugo is absurdly fast! The Developers claim that a webpage can render just for 1 milisecond! Functionalities 1. Create a list page or a post using default templates. 2. Shortcodes You can use a shortcode instead of custom HTML to embed an youtube video. Just like that:
